teacheasy.xml.util

Class XMLUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.xml.util.XMLUtil

  • public class XMLUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utility methods to be used when working with the digital lesson XML format.
    Version:
    1.1 10 Apr 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Method Detail

      • checkColor

        public static boolean checkColor(java.lang.String hexCol)
        Static method to verify that a string conforms to the #AARRGGBB hex colour specification.
        Parameters:
        hexCol - The string to check.
        Returns:
        true if the colour string is valid, false otherwise.

      • checkColor

        public static java.lang.String checkColor(java.lang.String hexStr,
                          java.lang.String defaultStr,
                          XMLNotification.Level errorLevel,
                          java.util.ArrayList<XMLNotification> errorList,
                          java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Static method to check a colour string, and add an error to an error list if the colour is invalid.
        Parameters:
        hexStr - The string to check.
        defaultStr - The default to return if invalid.
        errorLevel - The level of error to log if invalid.
        errorList - The list to log the error in.
        errorMessage - The message to log with the error.
        Returns:
        either the string if it is valid, or the default.

      • checkFloat

        public static float checkFloat(java.lang.String str,
               float defaultValue,
               XMLNotification.Level errorLevel,
               java.util.ArrayList<XMLNotification> errorList,
               java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Static method to attempt to parse a float from a string, and log an error if a value cannot be parsed.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to parse from.
        defaultValue - The default value to insert if parsing fails.
        errorLevel - The level of the error to log if invalid.
        errorList - The list to log the error in.
        errorMessage - The message to log with the error.
        Returns:
        either the value parsed from the string or the default if invalid.

           int defaultValue,
           XMLNotification.Level errorLevel,

        Static method to attempt to parse a int from a string, and log an error if a value cannot be parsed.

        defaultValue - The default value to insert if parsing fails.
        errorLevel - The level of the error to log if invalid.
        errorList - The list to log the error in.
        errorMessage - The message to log with the error.
        Returns:
        either the value parsed from the string or the default if invalid.

      • checkBool

        public static boolean checkBool(java.lang.String str,
                boolean defaultValue,
                XMLNotification.Level errorLevel,
                java.util.ArrayList<XMLNotification> errorList,
                java.lang.String errorMessage)
        A static method to attempt to parse a boolean from a string, and add an error to an error list if invalid.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to parse from.
        defaultValue - The default value to insert if invalid.
        errorLevel - The error level to log if invalid.
        errorList - The error list to log to.
        errorMessage - The message to log with the error.
        Returns:
        the parsed value or the default if invalid.
